legal_basis: sections 3 and 39 of the VRAB Act
evidence_assessment: improperly considered weight without medical evidence
failed to consider new medical evidence from Drs. Scott and Kulkarni
new_evidence: new medical evidence from Drs. Scott and Kulkarni
result_of_case: case remanded for redetermination with costs awarded to Lenzen
conclusion_outcome: Federal Court allowed the judicial review, remitting the case to a different VRAB panel for reconsideration
